<title level="1" right="Cantrip 1" pfs="Standard">[Stoke the Heart](/Spells.aspx?ID=807)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=22" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Hex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=324" />
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=323" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 239 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Patron Theme**
[Fervor](/Patrons.aspx?ID=4)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Intense fervor fills the target creature, empowering their blows. The target gains a +2 status bonus to damage rolls. Once this spell ends, the target becomes temporarily immune for 1 minute.

---
**Heightened (+2)** The status bonus to damage increases by 1.
name: Stoke the Heart
